<h3 id="X17718">X(17718)&nbsp;=&nbsp;MOSES (1, -2, 0, 0, 1, -1) POINT</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; 2 + cos A + cos B + cos C + cos(B - C) : : (Randy Hutson, April 17, 2018)
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3 - 2*a^2*b + b^3 - 2*a^2*c - b^2*c - b*c^2 + c^3 : :
<p>
X(17718) is the centroid of the six points of tangency of the 1st Yff circle triplets and the sides of ABC; see X(17728). (Randy Hutson, April 17, 2018)
</p>
<p>
X(17718) lies on these lines:

<p>
X(17718) = {X(2),X(354)}-harmonic conjugate of X(17728)<br>
